verses.text: In that day you will say, “I give you thanks, O Lord; for though you were angry with me, your anger is turned away and you have comforted me.
See! God is my salvation, I trust him unafraid. For my strength and my song is the Lord, and he is become my salvation.”
With joy you will draw water from the fountains of salvation.
And in that day you will say, “Give thanks to the Lord and call on his name. Make known to the nations what things he has done, record that his name is exalted on high.

To the Lord make music, for he has wrought proudly; let this be made known through the length of the world. Lift up your voices, you dwellers in Zion; for great in your midst is the Holy One of Israel.” Prophecies Concerning Foreign Nations
